mapper.sql:
oi.master_order_sn, oi.order_out_sn, oi.trans_type, oi.order_type, oi.relating_return_sn, oi.relating_remoney_sn, oi.user_id, oi.user_name,
oie.is_group, oi.source, oi.source_code, oi.clear_time, oi.order_status, oi.pay_status, oi.ship_status, oi.lock_status, oi.question_status, oi.notice_status, oi.order_from, oi.add_time, oi.referer, oi.shipping_total_fee, oi.integral_money, oi.pay_total_fee, oi.postscript, oi.total_payable, oi.goods_amount, oi.total_fee, oi.money_paid, oi.surplus, oi.bonus, oi.goods_count, oi.discount, oi.confirm_time, oi.relating_original_sn , oi.order_category, oi.invoices_organization,oi.shop_name channel_name, oi.channel_code,oi.register_mobile,oi.split_status, oi.bv_value,oi.expected_ship_date,oi.tax

oi.master_order_sn,od.order_sn, oi.order_out_sn, oi.trans_type, oi.order_type, oi.relating_return_sn, oi.relating_remoney_sn, oi.user_id, oi.user_name,
oi.order_status, oi.pay_status, oi.ship_status, oi.lock_status, oi.question_status, oi.notice_status, oi.order_from, oi.add_time, oi.referer, oi.shipping_total_fee, oi.integral_money, oi.pay_total_fee, oi.postscript, oi.total_payable, oi.goods_amount, oi.total_fee, oi.money_paid, oi.surplus, oi.bonus, oi.goods_count, oi.discount, oi.confirm_time, oi.relating_original_sn , oi.order_category, oi.invoices_organization
mapper.select:
SELECT tmp.*, op.pay_name, op.pay_note FROM ( SELECT common.goods_amount - common.discount - common.bonus - common.integral_money as settlement_price,
common.* FROM ( select ,
oai.country, oai.province, oai.city, oai.district, oai.consignee, oai.mobile, oai.tel,
op.pay_id, op.pay_time, op.create_time,
og.custom_code,
oie.is_advance from
master_order_info
master_order_info_history
oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend AS oie ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN
master_order_pay
master_order_pay_history
op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn
left JOIN
master_order_goods
master_order_goods_history
og ON oi.master_order_sn = og.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info_history oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
) common
GROUP BY common.master_order_sn
order by ${orderByClause} ) tmp LEFT JOIN master_order_pay op ON op.master_order_sn = tmp.master_order_sn
limit ${criterion.value},${criterion.secondValue}

SELECT count(1) from ( SELECT common.goods_amount - common.discount - common.bonus - common.integral_money as settlement_price,
common.* FROM ( select ,
oai.country, oai.province, oai.city, oai.district, oai.consignee, oai.mobile, oai.tel,
op.pay_id, op.pay_time, op.create_time,
og.custom_code,
oie.is_advance from
master_order_info
master_order_info_history
oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend AS oie ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN
master_order_pay
master_order_pay_history
op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn
left JOIN
master_order_goods
master_order_goods_history
og ON oi.master_order_sn = og.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info_history oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
) common
GROUP BY common.master_order_sn
GROUP BY od.order_sn
) tmp LEFT JOIN master_order_pay op ON op.master_order_sn = tmp.master_order_sn

SELECT common.goods_amount - common.discount - common.bonus - common.integral_money as settlement_price, common.*, common.custom_code, SUM(common.goods_number) goods_num FROM ( select ,
oai.country, oai.province, oai.city, oai.district, oai.consignee, oai.mobile, oai.tel,
op.pay_id, op.pay_time, op.create_time,
og.custom_code, og.goods_number,
oie.is_advance from
master_order_info
master_order_info_history
oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend AS oie ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN
master_order_pay
master_order_pay_history
op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn
left JOIN
master_order_goods
master_order_goods_history
og ON oi.master_order_sn = og.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info_history oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
) common
GROUP BY common.master_order_sn, common.custom_code order by ${orderByClause}
limit ${criterion.value},${criterion.secondValue}

SELECT count(1) from ( SELECT common.goods_amount - common.discount - common.bonus - common.integral_money as settlement_price, common.* FROM ( select ,
oai.country, oai.province, oai.city, oai.district, oai.consignee, oai.mobile, oai.tel,
op.pay_id, op.pay_time, op.create_time,
og.custom_code,
oie.is_advance from
master_order_info
master_order_info_history
oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend AS oie ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN
master_order_pay
master_order_pay_history
op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn
left JOIN
master_order_goods
master_order_goods_history
og ON oi.master_order_sn = og.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info_history oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
) common
GROUP BY common.master_order_sn, common.custom_code
) tmp

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(oreturn.return_sn) return_sn,
common.* FROM ( select ,
oai.country, oai.province, oai.city, oai.district,
ci.channel_name,
oie.is_advance
from
order_distribute
order_distribute_history
od
LEFT JOIN
master_order_info
master_order_info_history
as oi on od.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend AS oie ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn
LEFT JOIN channel_info AS ci ON oi.order_from = ci.channel_code
LEFT JOIN
order_depot_ship
order_depot_ship_history
as os on od.order_sn = os.order_sn
INNER JOIN
master_order_pay
master_order_pay_history
op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn
left JOIN
master_order_goods
master_order_goods_history
og ON oi.master_order_sn = og.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info_history oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
) common
LEFT JOIN order_return AS oreturn ON oreturn.relating_order_sn = common.master_order_sn
GROUP BY common.master_order_sn
GROUP BY common.order_sn
order by ${orderByClause}
limit ${criterion.value},${criterion.secondValue}

SELECT
count(*)
FROM ( select ,
oai.country, oai.province, oai.city, oai.district,
ci.channel_name,
oie.is_advance
from
order_distribute
order_distribute_history
od
LEFT JOIN
master_order_info
master_order_info_history
as oi on od.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend AS oie ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn
LEFT JOIN channel_info AS ci ON oi.order_from = ci.channel_code
LEFT JOIN
order_depot_ship
order_depot_ship_history
as os on od.order_sn = os.order_sn
INNER JOIN
master_order_pay
master_order_pay_history
op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn
left JOIN
master_order_goods
master_order_goods_history
og ON oi.master_order_sn = og.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
INNER JOIN master_order_address_info_history oai ON oai.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
) common
LEFT JOIN order_return AS oreturn ON oreturn.relating_order_sn = common.master_order_sn
GROUP BY common.master_order_sn
GROUP BY common.order_sn
order by ${orderByClause}

select
bill_no, channel_code, bill_type, action_user, note, is_timing, exec_time, is_sync, add_time, update_time
from
order_bill_list
where 1=1
and channel_code like CONCAT('%','${channelCode}','%' )
and bill_no like CONCAT('%','${billNo}','%' )
and is_sync=#{isSync, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and bill_type=#{billType, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and bill_type in (1,2)
order by add_time desc
LIMIT #{start},#{limits}

select
count(*)
FROM
order_bill_list
where 1=1
and channel_code like CONCAT('%','${channelCode}','%' )
and bill_no like CONCAT('%','${billNo}','%' )
and is_sync=#{isSync, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and bill_type=#{billType, jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by add_time desc

select
bill_no, channel_code, bill_type, action_user, note, is_timing, exec_time, is_sync, add_time, update_time
from
order_bill_list
where 1=1
and bill_type=4
and bill_no like CONCAT('%','${billNo}','%' )
and is_sync=#{isSync, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and bill_type=#{billType, jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by add_time desc
LIMIT #{start},#{limits}

select
count(*)
FROM
order_bill_list
where 1=1 and bill_type=4
and bill_no like CONCAT('%','${billNo}','%' )
and is_sync=#{isSync, jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by add_time desc

select
bill_no, channel_code, bill_type, action_user, note, is_timing, exec_time, is_sync, add_time, update_time
from
order_bill_list
where 1=1
and bill_type=5
and bill_no like CONCAT('%','${billNo}','%' )
and is_sync=#{isSync, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and bill_type=#{billType, jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by add_time desc
LIMIT #{start},#{limits}

select
count(*)
FROM
order_bill_list
where 1=1 and bill_type=5
and bill_no like CONCAT('%','${billNo}','%' )
and is_sync=#{isSync, jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by add_time desc

SELECT oi.total_fee, oi.order_from orderFrom, oie.order_type createOrderType FROM master_order_info oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend oie ON oie.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn LEFT JOIN master_order_pay op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn
SELECT count(1) FROM master_order_info oi, master_order_address_info oai, master_order_info_extend oie, master_order_pay mop

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT count(1) FROM master_order_info oi, master_order_address_info oai, master_order_info_extend oie, master_order_goods mog, master_order_pay mop
group by oi.master_order_sn, mog.custom_code, mog.extension_code, mog.goods_price, mog.transaction_price, mog.settlement_price, mog.depot_code ) a
select count(1) FROM master_order_info_extend oie, master_order_address_info oai, master_order_info oi, order_distribute od

select oi.master_order_sn as masterOrderSn, oi.order_out_sn as outerOrderSn, oi.order_type as orderType, oi.shop_name as shopName, oi.referer, oi.order_from as orderFrom, oi.channel_code as channelCode, oi.order_status as orderStatus, oi.pay_status as payStatus, oi.ship_status as shipStatus, oi.user_id as userId, oi.user_name as userName, oi.add_time as addTime, oi.finish_time as finishTime, oi.goods_count as goodsCount, oi.goods_amount as goodsAmount, oi.total_fee as totalFee, oi.money_paid as moneyPaid, oi.discount, oi.question_status as questionStatus, oai.consignee as receiverName, oai.mobile as receiverMobile, oai.tel as receiverTel, oie.is_cac as isCac, oie.shop_code as storeCode, oie.shop_name as storeName, od.got_status as gotStatus, od.got_code as gotCode, oreturn.return_sn as returnSn, oreturn.return_allgoods_count as returnGoodsCount, oreturn.return_total_fee as returnTotalFee FROM master_order_info_extend as oie, master_order_address_info as oai, order_distribute as od, master_order_info as oi LEFT JOIN order_return as oreturn on oreturn.relating_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn and oreturn.return_order_status != 4
order by oi.add_time desc limit ${start}, ${limit}
select count(1) FROM master_order_info_extend oie, master_order_address_info oai, master_order_info oi, order_distribute od

select oi.master_order_sn as masterOrderSn, oi.order_out_sn as outerOrderSn, oi.order_type as orderType, oi.shop_name as shopName, oi.referer, oi.order_from as orderFrom, oi.channel_code as channelCode, oi.order_status as orderStatus, oi.pay_status as payStatus, oi.ship_status as shipStatus, oi.user_id as userId, oi.user_name as userName, oi.add_time as addTime, oi.finish_time as finishTime, oi.goods_count as goodsCount, oi.goods_amount as goodsAmount, oi.total_fee as totalFee, oi.money_paid as moneyPaid, oi.discount, oi.question_status as questionStatus, oai.consignee as receiverName, oai.mobile as receiverMobile, oai.tel as receiverTel, oie.is_cac as isCac, oie.shop_code as storeCode, oie.shop_name as storeName, od.got_status as gotStatus, od.got_code as gotCode, oreturn.return_sn as returnSn, oreturn.return_allgoods_count as returnGoodsCount, oreturn.return_total_fee as returnTotalFee FROM master_order_info_extend oie, master_order_address_info oai, order_distribute od, master_order_info oi LEFT JOIN order_return oreturn on oreturn.relating_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn and oreturn.return_order_status != 4 left join order_rider_distribute_log ord on ord.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn
order by oi.add_time desc limit ${start}, ${limit}

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT count(1) FROM master_order_info moi, master_order_goods mog where moi.master_order_sn = mog.master_order_sn and mog.extension_code = "common" and moi.order_status in (1, 3) and moi.add_time >= #{beginTime} and moi.add_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY moi.channel_code, moi.order_from, mog.goods_sn ) a

SELECT moi.channel_code channelCode, moi.order_from orderFrom, mog.custom_code customCode, mog.goods_sn goodsSn, sum(mog.goods_number) goodsNumber from master_order_info moi, master_order_goods mog where moi.master_order_sn = mog.master_order_sn and mog.extension_code = "common" and moi.order_status in (1, 3) and moi.add_time >= #{beginTime} and moi.add_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY moi.channel_code, moi.order_from, mog.goods_sn
limit ${start}, ${limit}

select moi.master_order_sn masterOrderSn, moi.add_time addTime, moi.user_id userId, moie.company_code companyId from master_order_info moi, master_order_info_extend moie where moi.master_order_sn = moie.master_order_sn and moi.order_status != 2 and moie.last_pay_date < #{dateTime} and moie.pay_period_status = 0
